Summary: 5 orange objects- repeat of last night, higher speed,closer formation
divs: Sighting Details5 orange lightbulb shapes, glowing. Last one was red. arched from nw. down, then up ne. & gone. 6 hoaxed balloons released from mountain in distance floated straight up slowly until burnout. not more than 10 minutes from last arching object. NO COMPARISON! & SAW them released from mountain! Size ,speed, & brightness very different.[someone is paying attention it seems]
